description:
The free limited Lite version of our popular Tile Breaker game! It has our first 10 levels for you to try!
Tile Breaker a Breakout style game in the spirit of Brick Breaker, Breakout & Arkanoid has come to the Palm WebOS.  Move the paddle using the Touch Screen, Keypad and Tilt control! Tile Breaker even includes sound. 
We feature 50 unique levels of tile breaking action with many surprises for those that make it. We’ve added power-ups like nuclear, multi ball, paddle increase and decrease. Beware the rare, but dreaded skull. Touch it and you lose a life. 
Save your high scores and show your friends. Select any completed level to play from. If you are having a hard time playing you can always adjust the difficulty between slow, medium or fast balls. You can also adjust how high or low the paddle is so if you have large or small fingers you can still enjoy the game. As always read the instructions for all the features. Be sure to check out the preference settings to adjust the game for you.
Invasive Bamboo is committed to updating the levels and adding fresh new challenges to this game. Keep your eyes open for new levels and updated features as we enhance Tile Breaker just for you. We listen to your feedback and continue to provide new challenges and features.
* UPDATE * changed name to Tile Breaker, much cooler indeed.
